mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, reg_at, mod_at, read_count from board order by reg_at desc

select a.bno, title, writer, mod_at, read_count , count(f.uuid) attached from (select bno from board where bno > 0
order by bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{qty}) a left join board b on a.bno = b.bno left join b_file f on f.bno = a.bno group by a.bno
select count(bno) count from board where bno > 0
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, mod_at = now() where bno = #{bno}
